Sufficient support and guidance is provided by the doctor as well as the staff. A good care is taken of hygiene and sanitation. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had an enjoyable experience with Dr. Dilip Raj Purohit and his staff. My daughter was very anxious about the appointment and any procedure, but Dr. Dilip Raj Purohit was very patient with her and spent a lot of time trying to calm her down, the staff was accommodating and kind and always available to help. Dr. Dilip Raj Purohit is very professional, he takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice, It's not easy to find a good dentist for your kids, so I highly recommend Dr. Dilip Raj Purohit and her staff for kids and adults.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My association with Dr. Purohit was since the time he was practicing at Aesthetica, New Alipore. I had gone to the clinic with excruciating pain in my teeth and gums. After lending me a patient hearing he was able to cure the pain and more importantly,address my concerns. This was followed by extraction which was seemingly painless. 

What is most impressive with Dr. Purohit is the quick diagnosis and the alternative treatment plans which he explains to his patients taking into consideration the cost involvement and what is best for the patient. At every step of the treatment he continuously interacts with his patients with his friendly behavior and makes the entire procedure exceedingly patient friendly.

Its been the most satisfying experience for me thus far and I would surely recommend him to anyone with a dental problem. 

Thank you Doctor *** *** ********* ********** God bless you!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Great Experience.ThanksSubhadeep
reply_text: Thank you Mr. Subhadeep Goswami  , Nothing is more rewarding than the patient feeling happy about the outcome of the treatment

review: I consulted Dr Purohit for occasional wisdom tooth pain. He was extremely patient in hearing out the concern as well as during the check up and also educated me on the concerns that might or might not arise in future. Even though he suggested a tooth extraction he also emphasised it is not required immediately which makes him trustworthy. A very humble, soft spoken and well versed doctor with an equally hygienic clinic and friendly staff.
reply_text: Thank you Ms.Shilpa Dhawan!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: When it comes to dentists, getting the right doctor is very important. Since 2012, Aesthetica has been the only place I visit for any issues related to teeth. I don't stay in Kolkata now and I always ensure that if there is any issue, I will get it done only when I am in Kolkata. The reason is simple, I get very good treatment, I am explained everything that is being done and why it is being done.
reply_text: Reading this kind of feedback is very rewarding ! thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience -Dr.Dilip raj purohit

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr. Dilip Purohit for smile correction or design. He explained me all the possibilities/options clearly at the start of the treatment. The way he took care about my difficulties regarding any pain or discomfort during the treatment was excellent. He also provided clear reason for whatever he was doing during treatment. Even after/in between the treatment I was called/followed up over phone for any difficulties. Clinic facilities are good, maintaining high standard of hygiene. Overall a very good experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Although we had an appointment with Dr Pratibha Sharma,she was late but Dr. Purohit came to the rescue,while he too was late by only 15 mins,which by far is the earliest iv seen any doctor come for the appointment.(chuckles)However, Dr Purohit was quite friendly and discussed in details the various aspects( in layman's terms )that can be considered before delving into that actual treatment which is much appreciated.We havent had any previous doctors we had consulted, discuss at length about the different modern dentistry techniques, which I think is essential for patient knowledge and a welcome move.
reply_text:
Thank you for the constructive feedback.
We try our best to minimize the waiting time,but sometimes the previous patients treatment takes extra time than expected and that Inturn causes delays,thank you for the valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went for a dental checkup, and Dr Purohit was very friendly and patient and explained possible treatment plans while emphasising that none of them were necessary at the moment. He also implied that if I chose to go ahead with treatment, it wouldn't have to be at his clinic, which makes it clear to me that he is an honest professional and doesn't prescribe things just to increase income, as many doctors often do. This makes him trustworthy to me, and I will definitely visit his practice again. The staff are also friendly.
reply_text: Thank you for the humble feedback , We always try to solve the primary problem of the patient with priority and we explain them about the need for other treatments over the time , happy that i was able to convey the same.

tags: None
